trans-unit.source: Provides qualifying information to a callback method when a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.PresenceChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.LocalPresenceChanged"></xref> event occurs.
Specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerChangeType"></xref> object containing data that specifies the type of change that has occurred to the presence status of a peer.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.

If the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> specified by <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PresenceChangedEventArgs.PeerEndPoint%2A> is not associated with a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>, this value is `null`.

<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
Specifies the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.
<xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> on which the presence information has changed.

Specifies the changed presence information of a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> as well as a string provided by <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> describing the updated presence status.
Changed presence information for <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> and a string describing the updated presence status.
